org.elasticsearch.client.support

类 AbstractClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.common.component.AbstractComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.client.support.AbstractClient
  • 所有已实现的接口:

    public abstract class AbstractClient
extends AbstractComponent
implements Client

      • prepareExecute

        public final <Request extends ActionRequest,Response extends ActionResponse,RequestBuilder extends ActionRequestBuilder<Request,Response,RequestBuilder>> RequestBuilder prepareExecute(Action<Request,Response,RequestBuilder> action)
        从接口复制的说明: ElasticsearchClient
        Prepares a request builder to execute, specified by Action.
        指定者:
        prepareExecute 在接口中 ElasticsearchClient
        类型参数:
        Request - The request type.
        Response - The response type.
        RequestBuilder - The request builder.
        参数:
        action - The action type to execute.
        返回:
        The request builder, that can, at a later stage, execute the request.

      • execute

        public final <Request extends ActionRequest,Response extends ActionResponse,RequestBuilder extends ActionRequestBuilder<Request,Response,RequestBuilder>> ActionFuture<Response> execute(Action<Request,Response,RequestBuilder> action,
                                                                                                                                                                                         Request request)
        从接口复制的说明: ElasticsearchClient
        Executes a generic action, denoted by an Action.
        指定者:
        execute 在接口中 ElasticsearchClient
        类型参数:
        Request - The request type.
        Response - the response type.
        RequestBuilder - The request builder type.
        参数:
        action - The action type to execute.
        request - The action request.
        返回:
        A future allowing to get back the response.

        request - The action request.

        public ActionFuture<IndexResponse> index(IndexRequest request)
        从接口复制的说明: Client
        Index a JSON source associated with a given index and type.

        The id is optional, if it is not provided, one will be generated automatically.

        指定者:

        返回:
